mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_song (id, name, songId, artistId, lyricId, mp3Url, origin, createTime, modifyTime)VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{songId}, #{artistId}, #{lyricId}, #{mp3Url}, #{origin}, NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE t_song SET mp3Url = #{mp3Url}, modifyTime = NOW() WHERE songId = #{songId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, songId, artistId, lyricId, mp3Url, origin, createTime, modifyTime FROM t_song WHERE songId = #{songId}
